rlu.sqltrainer.gui
Class SQLTrainerModel

java.lang.Object
  rlu.sqltrainer.gui.SQLTrainerModel

public class SQLTrainerModel
extends java.lang.Object

Adapter which hides application design details from the frame. It provides access to the state of the SQLTrainer instance and maintains some additional informations about the currently used databases.

Author:
R. Lunde

Nested Class Summary
(package private) static class SQLTrainerModel.DBTableModel
          Model, which provides JTable instances with the data they need.
(package private) static class SQLTrainerModel.EventType
          Classifies the events signaled to the view to inform about model changes.
static class SQLTrainerModel.ModelEvent
          Object indicating to interested listeners what has changed in the model.
static interface SQLTrainerModel.ModelListener
          Observer interface for views which need to be informed about model state changes and log messages to be printed out.
